data.text:
Our favourite hotel in Dubai and the world. Burj Al Arab truly is the world’s only 7 star hotel. We stayed for a few nights in April this year and had a wonderful stay. 

Our butlers Gucci and Maryam were so helpful and could not do enough for us. The hotel was also very helpful over e-butler before we arrived and during our stay. 

The pool area is world class with amazing service and facilities. The wrap around infinity pool was stunning. If you can’t afford to stay at the hotel it is definitely still worth visiting to use the pool area. 

Breakfast was also fantastic each day with a large selection of food and you also can order from the al a carte menu which feels like a more premium experience in line with the hotel. 

Finally our hotel suite was amazing. So large compared to any other hotel room. We stayed in the 2 bedroom family suite. As a family of 5 this was a perfect room for us with so much space. 

Overall I would highly recommend this hotel and will definitely be returning in the near future.
data.title: World’s best hotel - Wonderful Stay

user_location.name: Cottingham, East Riding of Yorkshire, England

data.text: Great service in all department and very friendly helpful staff. Food was so tasty we enjoyed very much in the hotel, swimming pool so big. we are enjoyed lot. Staff was very helpful. they all are very professional staff. All are very helpful. all good.
data.title: excellent food and service

user_location.name: New Delhi, National Capital Territory of Delhi

data.text:
This review is not about the whole hotel but just the UMA Lounge. We were staying at St. Regis Palm but my family wanted to visit the iconic Burj Al Arab. I found a following option on their website: UMA Premium Cabana Reservation for 1,500dirhams (around USD400), maximum capacity 6persons. The amount was redeemable credit to be used. 

The UMA Lounge is a gigantic tourist trap. The menu is a total disaster, not even an attempt to offer something more sophisticated besides Club Sandwich and Pizza Margherita. I am more than happy to pay premium for something special but $40 for a hot chocolate that didnt look or taste anything special?  

Stay away from this place, there are hundreds of better places to visit in Dubai.
data.title: UMA Lounge - Huge Tourist Trap

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 321jirih,

Greetings from Burj Al Arab!

Firstly, I would like to express my sincerest appreciation to you for having chosen Burj Al Arab as your preferred residence during your recent visit to Dubai. I would also like to thank you for having taken the time to leave a review following your stay with us.

While I do sincerely apologize for the disappointing experience you encountered during your recent stay with us, your feedback is essential to us to ensure that your concerns are addressed promptly and effectively. 

It is through feedback from our valued guests such as yourself that we are able to constantly improve our level of service and I would like to thank you for bringing your experience to our attention.

Thank you for choosing Burj Al Arab Jumeirah.

Kind Regards,
Alyaa Al Bishr
Assistant Leading Quality Manager
Burj Al Arab
owner_response.author: Maryam Al Fardan

data.text: Outstanding in every aspect of the word! 7-stars well earned actually closer to infinity stars of if I had my way.. location, hospitality, suites, comfort, amenities, not one miss or less then outstanding..  The pools, Beaches, restaurants breakfast all of it ,,,BRAVO
data.title: Outstandingly Amazing

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Global,

Greetings from Burj Al Arab!

Firstly, I would like to express my sincerest appreciation to you for your kind patronage to Burj Al Arab as your preferred residence during your recent visit to Dubai. I would also like to thank you for having taken the time to leave a review following your stay with us.

We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful experience. Our team takes great pride in providing exceptional service and it is heartwarming to know that our colleagues, exceeded your expectations. I look forward to sharing your kind words with them alongside the whole team, as I am sure it will further encourage them to fulfil our mission to deliver service beyond expectations. 

Thank you for choosing Burj Al Arab Jumeirah. 

Kind Regards,
Alyaa Al Bishr
Assistant Leading Quality Manager
Burj Al Arab
owner_response.author: Maryam Al Fardan

data.text:
Great service in all department and very friendly helpful staff
Especially after the Jumeirah executive pool we were spoiled by Nasir and Kawser. 
They made our stay very special   Our staff in the libby made great efforts to arrange transport in bad weather so we made it on time to the airport to get our flight
data.title: Very good and beautiful hotel
